title: The several speeches of Duke Hamilton Earl of Cambridg, Henry Earl of Holland, and Arthur Lord Capel, upon the scaffold immediately before their execution, on Friday the 9. of March. Also the several exhortations, and conferences with them, upon the scaffold, by Dr Sibbald, Mr Bolton, & Mr Hodges. Published by special authority.
author: Hamilton, James Hamilton, Duke of, 1606-1649.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for Peter Cole, Francis Tyton, and John Playford,
